projects.title: American Campus Communities
projects.description:
# American Campus Communities 25th Anniversary

This was a brochure page for the 25th anniversary of American Campus Communities. It was built with Vanilla JS. All of the animations and scroll effects were designed and developed specifically for this project.

> Vanilla JS

> Custom Animations

> Front-end Lead

projects.title: The Arthritis Foundation
projects.description:
# The Arthritis Foundation

This was a complete redesign and reimplementation of the Arthritis Foundation's public facing website. It was a long project that lead to the redesign and implementation of two other sub sites (Arthritis Connect Groups, and Arthritis LiveYes!). 

The home article pages were build as static pages using Vanilla JS for animations and interactions. The Search, Find a Doctor, and Article Listing pages are single page Vue.JS applications that get and post data to an API, displaying data managed in their CMS.

> Vanilla JS

> Vue.JS

> Custom Animations

> Front-end Lead

projects.title: ASBMB
projects.description:
# American Society for Biochemistry and Molecular Biology

Redesign and reimplementation of the ASBMB public facing website and member portal. I was the lead front-end developer on the project, but delegated tasks to other team mates who assisted.

> jQuery

> Vanilla JS

> Front-end Collaboration
